Local (Phoenix) UX UI Designer needed for project: $1,000 – approx. 25hrs.
• Redesign UX UI for EventKey.net & create design for new features.
• Great to add to your portfolio because our users are thousands of professionals in Phoenix. This could in turn give you more potential clients.

EventKey.net is a social media platform for events. Users can log in, create a profile, RSVP to events, create events, buy tickets for events, and interact with other attendees on the attendee list. We need to redesign the UX UI design of the current website (go ahead and log in EventKey.net). In addition, create wireframes for new features, like the ticket transferring.
We will meet in person on 3 evenings to discuss our features and what your plan is for the UX UI design.
Next step: input the wireframe designs that you created into an Invisionapp prototype and send that prototype to our software developers so they can develop the code behind the design.

Project Managing the adaptive general education program to improve the student success rate in courses; Creating program structure, cost and staffing estimates; Developing and disseminating our vision for new adaptive/active learning model; Leading course development teams composed of faculty, instructional designers and consultants; Managing implementation process for new courseware; Coordinating program evaluation activities.

•  Voted “The Best Hispanic Entrepreneur of the Year 2016” for launching EventKey.•  Led focus group & interviewed over 500 potential customers, gathered product requirements, resulting in demand insights.•  Recruited and led team of 20+ development, engineering, product, design and marketing professionals.•  Successfully negotiated fair contracts with employees, offshore contractors, and customers.•  Developed detailed project plans to track progress resulting in consistently meeting deadlines, and quality specifications.•  Ensured all projects were delivered on-time, within scope and within budget.•  Performed risk management resulting in minimizing project risks through developing contingency plans.•  Resolved internal and external company conflicts in a swift, efficient, courteous manner.•  Great motivator. Led team to believe in project and maximized their talents.•  Trained and mentored employees to quickly overcome technical and personal roadblocks.•  Implemented EventKey at 100+ events, resulting in 1,000 beta users.•  Built strategic community business relationships •  Largest client: Microsoft

•  Monetized YouTube business – 250K views, 500 product reviews and 80,000 sales worldwide in 23 countries.•  Featured as a “success story” on ASU’s website for starting a company that generated $1-$2K/month as a student.
Opportunity Catalyst, Center for Entrepreneurship at W. P. Carey
•  Directed website development and UI / UX for ASU entrepreneurship page.•  Certified by ASU – Startup School Facilitator.
•  Communicated with students to help them make informed decisions by providing ethical, timely, accurate and comprehensive    program information. Sold over $200K worth of tuition programs.

recommendations: Esperanza Clavell
Intérprete simultánea y traductora del inglés, español y portugués de Brasil
December 5, 2014, Esperanza was senior to Rafael but didn’t manage directly

I am a professional interpreter and I have first hand witnessed Rafael Testai's hunger to master oratory and interpretation. On a car ride back, we once played a game in which we challenged each other to translate idioms from Spanish into English and vice versa. As any interpreter knows, this is one of the most challenging aspects of interpreting. Only one who has truly lived and submerded in the culture can manage to translate idioms. Rafael taught me some new ones, He understands interpreting because he translates thoughts, not isolated words, which results in accurate interpretations. I have absolute confidence that with his perseverance and natural talent in both languages, he will reach mastery in interpreting."Esperanza Clavell, Sworn Translator and Simultaneous Interpreter - +30 years active experience.(English-Spanish-Brazilian Portuguese, to and fro)

Esveide Ramos
IT Recruiter at VincentBenjamin
June 15, 2017, Esveide worked with Rafael in the same group

I met Esveide at the Galvanize #yesphx event on 4/5/17. We exchanged contacts via EventKey mobile app and I informed her that I was looking for a Project Manager position. In a matter of 7 hours she got me a phone interview with the employer, followed by an in-person interview, and I was offered a job that same day at 3pm.  Esveide was very professional, had a great positive attitude, and I never felt alone through the hiring process. More importantly, she created results. I got the position I wanted and the company that hired me got the applicant that they wanted. I would recommend Vincent Benjamin and Esveide to anyone who's looking for an IT job.

Alice Rush
Master Career Counselor (MCC) with 25 years experience providing career counseling and employee  training
May 24, 2017, Rafael was a client of Alice’s

Alice helped me understand who I am so that I can choose my career path. I can't emphasize how important it is to have a true professional with over two decades of experience help you identify who you are. I would recommend Alice to any friend, no matter the age or gender. A session with her can bring clarity into your life. Clarity that no other purchase can provide. For that, I find her work priceless. She is leaving Arizona State University. But once I have my thriving business, I will contact her so she can coach my employees.

summary: Rafael Testai is the recipient of "The Best Hispanic Entrepreneur of the Year 2016"​ awarded by DAS Foundation. Rafael is the Project Manager for Arizona State University's EdPlus Adaptive Learning Educational Program.In addition, Rafael is the CEO and founder of  EventKey, an award-winning mobile app & web platform  that graced the cover of Phoenix Business Journal on May 2017. EventKey is the Eventbrite for professional events. EventKey allows attendees to RSVP to events using Linkedin and permits attendees to create more collaborative experiences amongst themselves via the platform. Hence, giving the organization that's hosting the event more value. Microsoft has used EventKey multiple times to host their professional events in their Chandler, AZ location. Try EventKey at your events here: https://www.geteventkey.com/Rafael is a self-motivated individual and self-starter with an orientation toward getting things done.  What drives him is the realization of how fortunate he is to be a US citizen. Italian family, born in Argentina, raised in the USA for half of his life. Contact: Raf@GetEventKey.com
name: Rafael Testai
title: Grit |  Project Manager at ASU EdPlus |  CEO at EventKey 📱
